CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Open Redirect, Cross-Site Request Forgery, and Cross-Site Scripting attacks. The Open Redirect vulnerability is due to the use of the getJSON function to load data from an external site. The Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability is due to the use of the live function to bind event handlers to elements, which can be triggered by malicious actions.
